column6: An amnesiac Dr. Bruce Banner has awoken in Paris and now finds himself in a desperate power struggle…for the Hulk! Who wants Banner's monstrous alter ego to do their bidding—and what happens when he doesn't know who the Hulk is, or how to unleash him? A mind-bending mystery + creepy robots + crazy science = quirky cool Hulk action downloaded directly from the mad minds of Keatinge & Kowalski!
